data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of East New Britain a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of East New Britain, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of East New Britain prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.section_summary: On average, 20 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in East New Britain, Papua New Guinea.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 75,506 believers in the state of East New Britain.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 234,439 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, English-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of East New Britain. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in East New Britain, Papua New Guinea to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.focus_label: East New Britain, Papua New Guinea

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 75,506 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.full_name: East New Britain, Papua New Guinea
